channel.title: Special bar?
channel.description:
Hi all, My server has all of the special attacks for my wepons coded in it just has no butoon (special bar) to use them, I have searched all round the forums , but nothing, So does can anyone direct me to a topic that may help me code them in?
Many thanks Kiz[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 15, 2008, 07:20:03 am[/size][hr]Bump! please could someone atleast attempt to help me?
